name: Aroma de Nicaragua - Rainforest - Toro Maduro
additionalNotes:
Aroma de Nicaragua is a High Quality Cigar coming from Nicaragua where all the winner brands are born, over 25 years of experience come together harvesting and selecting the finest leaves of Tobacco for your pure pleasure, the experience of our master blenders will guarantee the best flavor in every 
This two-vitola line includes tobacco from all four main growing regions in Nicaragua: Condega, Estelí, Jalapa and Ometepe. Comes with Nicarauan wrapper, filler and binder.
